title: [K-12] Online Intensive Course on Core Technologies of Electrical Engineering Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic electrical theory (voltage, current, resistance, etc.) and experience constructing simple circuits
context.additional_context: Providing mobile-optimized content enabling smartphone-based learning, utilizing mobile-friendly virtual tools as alternatives to simulation hardware

learning_goals: Actual electrical system operations can be replicated with 80% or higher accuracy using smartphone-based simulation tools
Circuit problem diagnoses and solutions can be derived with 70% or higher accuracy by interpreting simulation results
Design methods complying with electrical facility safety standards (e.g., prevention of electric shock) by 90% or more in simulation environments can be explained

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
